title: 28 Books - Integral Philosophy, Ken Wilber, et al
description:
28 Books by, or about Ken Wilber and Integral Philosophy
--------------------------------------------------------

A huge collection of books by the controversial but often brilliant philosopher and transpersonal psychology author Ken Wilber.

I will not try to give an introduction to his gigantic philosophy or its critics here, but anybody interested in the following topics will likely benefit by checking out some of his work: Eastern and western philosophy, Science of consciousness/mind, Science and Spirituality dialogue, The brain/mind problem. Theories about ultimate reality, The contemplative traditions in all major world religions and in particularly in Buddhism and Adviata Vedanta. Cultural and Individual Evolution/Transformation. Theories about mindfulness and other forms of meditation, How quantum physics is, and is not, related to phenomena and mind.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
If you like this torrent you will quite likely like this as well:

MEDITATION - in the Perspective of Science, Health or Spirituality
(10 hours Video 66 Hours Audio on one single DVD)
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4570538/MEDITATION_-_in_the_Perspective_of_Science__Health_or_Spirituali

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3541916/Spirituality__philosophy_and_science_on_video_and_audio_from_WIE

Also remember that knowledge and wisdom is useless if a person is not emotionally healthy balanced as well. That is regardless to how much philosophy that is absorbed. So be kind to yourself and others. This is might be a good example:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3408201/%5BAudioBook%5D_Kornfield__Jack_--_Roots_of_Buddhist_Psychology_(Sou
